WorkItem.ClosedComment: Out of date, Buffs were greatly simplified in Cataclysm
WorkItem.Description:
In our Guild raids we have one dps warrior with commanding presence, trouble is he runs with only 2/5 commanding presence. In rawr under commanding shout and battle shout it can either be set on or off essentially 0/5 commanding presence or 5/5 commanding presence.
Â 
Could a selector be put in place so you can select how many out of 5 the applying warrior has in commanding presence for the buff?

Comments.Message:
In order to set this up, we'd need to do it for all the buffs that have variable points, because once we did yours everyone would start asking for their specific buff, yadda yadda. We also need to rewrite the buffs pane in order to make this happen.

So ya, we could feasibly do it, but it's a low priority since most users won't need it and it would take some hefty work to get it done.
